K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:42a-1: a'arya sv'alp'a aaksha ra pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:42a-3: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung du zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:42a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:42a-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:42a-7: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:42b-0: @42b byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:42b-3: 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:42b-4: dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khril bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:42b-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:42b-6: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:42b-7: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:42b-8: 'dzum mul te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:42b-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung du la bsod nams che ba; gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:42b-11: byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:42b-12: gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs ma mchis par gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:42b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43a-0: khyod yun ring por sems can thams cad la @43a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43a-1: phan pa'i phyir brtson pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43a-4: legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43a-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung du la bsod nams che ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43a-6: gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa byang bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43a-7: byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43a-8: gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs med par sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43a-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43a-10: sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sems can thams cad dgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so; ;mnyam par bzhag pa des smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i phrag nas 'od zer 'bum phrag du ma byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43a-12: 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43b-0: sems can gang dag 'od zer des reg pa sems can dmyal ba yan chad sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @43b pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du lha'i tsandan gyi phye ma'i char yang bab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43b-5: byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa'i sems dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43b-8: sdig pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems su bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43b-9: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di yang gdon par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43b-12: aom mu ne mu ne mah'a mu na ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43b-13: ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43b-14: sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43b-16: khyod kyis 'di nyid thob pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43b-17: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:43b-18: zhes sangs rgyas nyid du lung yang bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44a-1: khyod kyi ming nyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44a-4: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44a-5: glegs ba ma du bris nas mchod pa byed pa de dag thams cad ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44a-9: aa ba me sa ra sa ra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44a-12: de ba ta aa nu p'a la ne; bud dhota t'a ra ni p'u ra ya p'u ra ya bha ga ba ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44a-13: sarb'a sha ma sha ma pa ri p'u ra ya sa pa ri wa ra sya sarba satva n'anytsa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44a-14: sarba karma a'a ba ra na bi sho dha ya bi sho dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44a-15: buddha aa dhishtha ne na sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44a-16: don dam pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44a-17: sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44a-20: byang chub sbyin par byed pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44a-22: bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phan yon brjod par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44a-23: 'di bklags pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44a-24: gsang sngags thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44a-25: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44a-26: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44a-28: ci'i slad du 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44b-0: @44b bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44b-2: sems can gang dag spro ba chung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44b-5: yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de dag thams cad thabs sla bas byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44b-6: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44b-7: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji tsam du sems can thams cad la sman pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44b-10: sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44b-12: bde ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44b-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44b-20: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44b-23: lha ma yin dang; dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:44b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:45a-0: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung du zhes @45a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-019:45a-1: bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so //
